entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow and blowing snow beginning near noon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
